description: Pigsqueak (Bergenia 'Eden's Magic Giant') is an amazing plant species for many reasons. Its density of rich green foliage makes it an ideal accent for any garden. It boasts showy, red bell-shaped flowers that can reach up to 8 inches in diameter, blooming abundantly in late winter and early spring. As the temperatures drop, its evergreen leaves take on a russet-bronze hue adding to its visual interest. It grows well in partial shade to full sun and its strong root system makes it both wind and drought tolerant.
